name: handshake-tester
description: Projet simple pour tester les connecteurs avec playwright et post-me

scripts.test:ping: node --test --test-name-pattern="should load handshake connector and call ping function" test/*.test.js
scripts.test:multi: node --test --test-name-pattern="should handle worker and pilot pages simultaneously" test/*.test.js
scripts.test:worker-control: node --test --test-name-pattern="should allow pilot to control worker URL" test/*.test.js
